dct_title_s: Map of Blanchard River Basin (upper portion) showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Blanchard River Basin (Upper portion)
dct_description_sm: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Blanchard Basin, quality of underground water, and hydrograph of well ha-3.
"Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water, from data compiled by Lawrence R. Brunstetter".
